name: MakerDAO
description: MakerDAO is a decentralized organization built on Ethereum to allow borrowing of stablecoins without the need for a middle man.

en.name: MakerDAO
en.description: MakerDAO is a decentralized organization built on Ethereum to allow borrowing of stablecoins without the need for a middle man.

fr.name: MakerDAO
fr.description: MakerDAO est une organisation décentralisée construite sur Ethereum qui permet l'emprunt de stablecoins sans avoir besoin d'un intermédiaire.

es.name: MakerDAO
es.description: MakerDAO es una organización descentralizada basada en Ethereum para permitir el préstamo de monedas estables sin la necesidad de un intermediario.

de.name: MakerDAO
de.description: MakerDAO ist eine dezentralisierte Organisation, die auf Ethereum aufbaut, um das Ausleihen von Stablecoins zu ermöglichen, ohne dass ein Mittelsmann benötigt wird.

pt.name: MakerDAO
pt.description: MakerDAO é uma organização descentralizada construída no Ethereum para permitir o empréstimo de stablecoins sem a necessidade de um intermediário.

el.name: MakerDAO
el.description: MakerDAO is a decentralized organization built on Ethereum to allow borrowing of stablecoins without the need for a middle man.

tr.name: MakerDAO
tr.description: MakerDAO, bir aracıya ihtiyaç duymadan sabit paraların ödünç alınmasına izin vermek için Ethereum üzerine kurulmuş merkezi olmayan bir organizasyondur.

vi.name: MakerDAO
vi.description: MakerDAO is a decentralized organization built on Ethereum to allow borrowing of stablecoins without the need for a middle man.

zh.name: MakerDAO
zh.description: MakerDAO 是以太坊上的去中心化组织，允许用户无需通过第三方即可借出稳定币。

hi.name: MakerDAO
hi.description: MakerDAO एक विकेन्द्रीकृत संगठन है जिसे एथेरियम पर बनाया गया है ताकि किसी बिचौलिए की आवश्यकता के बिना स्थिर मुद्रा उधार लेने की अनुमति दी जा सके।
